  1. Coffee

    1. Aeropress

    2. Coffee Filters

    3. Coffee grinder

  2. Appliances

    1. Air Fryer

    2. 2 forks

    2. Mixing bowl

    3. 2 plates

    4. 2 mason jars

    1. Large Tupperware

    5. Strainer

  8. Pantry

    2. Pepper

    3. Beans

    4. Rice

    5. Dried chiles

    6. Quinoa
